resource.chars: ※（不明）圓息女是世後經數年至徳三年始而充近吉

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4748,3840h-218v-3840h218v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 身被補任相國寺大工職畢而近吉明徳四年孫九

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4460,3840h-233v-3840h233v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 郎二歳之時拾取為養子致扶持去應永廿八年於

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4169,3840h-221v-3840h221v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 天龍寺以下所々者令譲与孫九郎之間撰遣本證文

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3853,3840h-220v-3840h220v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 者也至相國寺以下所々者依為實子孫次郎譲得之

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3579,3840h-238v-3840h238v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 互無其煩沙汰來之處孫九郎男今年五月盗掠賜

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3301,3840h-219v-3840h219v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 相國寺補任云々如孫九郎陳状者天龍寺相國寺以下

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3046,3840h-221v-3840h221v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 所々大工職妙圓遺跡是世女相計之訖仍為養母跡

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2442,3840h-203v-3840h203v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 悉可相續之處以令嫁是世由緒為大夫次郎入道計

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2178,3840h-217v-3840h217v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 支配之段無謂殊孫次郎所出帯至徳三年補任者

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1891,3840h-205v-3840h205v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 為充是世實子彦次郎身支證也然間其子細就歎申

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1590,3840h-206v-3840h206v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 令安堵云々彼実否被尋下　公方之御大工近定幷

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1310,3840h-221v-3840h221v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 近宗國近等之處条々孫九郎申詞参差者也訴人

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1010,3840h-236v-3840h236v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 孫次郎申分無相違之旨以告文捧注進状之上彼孫

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M721,3840h-220v-3840h220v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 九郎被養育近吉乍受所々譲不可用養父之間

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M450,3840h-261v-3840h261v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: ※（不明）捨其状之由申之条旁以狼籍無理之段令露顯之
